      Int Used to track what method needs to be called to update the screen after sending a friend request.

      TextView displays any error messages.

      Button sends friend requests to the user specified in the FriendReqTo EditText.

      String stores the ending of the URL path mapping for any http requests sent within this activity.

      Button displays the user's friends.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void acceptFriendReq()
      Sends POST request to backend accepting one of the user's incoming friend requests.
      private void cancelFriendReq()
      Sends POST request to backend canceling one of the user's outgoing friend requests.
      private void denyFriendReq()
      Sends POST request to backend denying one of the user's incoming friend requests.
      private void displayFriendsList​(org.json.JSONArray FriendsList)
      Displays all others the user is currently friends with.
      private void displayPendingFriendReq​(org.json.JSONArray PendingFriendReq)
      Displays all others that have sent a friend request to the user.
      private void displaySentFriendReq​(org.json.JSONArray SentFriendReq)
      Displays all others that the user has sent a friend request to.
      protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)  
      private void removeFriend()
      Sends POST request to backend removing the selected friend from the user's friends list.
      private void sendRequest()
      Sends a POST request to the backend containing a friend request to the user specified in the FriendReqTo EditText.

    • Field Detail

      • DisplayTracker

        int DisplayTracker
        Int Used to track what method needs to be called to update the screen after sending a friend request. 1 = displaySentFriendReq() 2 = displayPendingFriendReq() others = displayFriendsList()

      • FriendsToMenu

        android.widget.ImageButton FriendsToMenu
        ImageButton takes user back to main menu.

      • SendFriendReq

        android.widget.Button SendFriendReq
        Button sends friend requests to the user specified in the FriendReqTo EditText.

      • ViewSentFriendReq

        android.widget.Button ViewSentFriendReq
        Button displays the user's sent friend requests.

      • ViewPendingFriendReq

        android.widget.Button ViewPendingFriendReq
        Button displays the user's pending friend requests.

      • ViewFriendsReq

        android.widget.Button ViewFriendsReq
        Button displays the user's friends.

      • FriendsListLayout

        android.widget.LinearLayout FriendsListLayout
        LinearLayout friends list container that holds all of the user's friends. Friends are displayed in smaller LinearLayouts that populate this LinearLayout.

      • ErrorMessage

        android.widget.TextView ErrorMessage
        TextView displays any error messages.

      • FriendReqTo

        android.widget.EditText FriendReqTo
        EditText specifies which other user the current user wants to send a friend request to.

      • currUser

        SingletonUser currUser
        SingletonUser instance which stores the currently logged in user.

      • context

        android.content.Context context
        Context for any volley requests made within this activity.

      • URLConcatenation

        java.lang.String URLConcatenation
        String stores the ending of the URL path mapping for any http requests sent within this activity.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in ComponentActivity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle). Note: Otherwise it is null. Loads friends screen onto device. Displays user's friends list by default.

      • sendRequest

        private void sendRequest()
        Sends a POST request to the backend containing a friend request to the user specified in the FriendReqTo EditText.

      • displayPendingFriendReq

        private void displayPendingFriendReq​(org.json.JSONArray PendingFriendReq)
        Displays all others that have sent a friend request to the user.
        Parameters:
        PendingFriendReq - List of other users who have sent the user a friend request

      • acceptFriendReq

        private void acceptFriendReq()
        Sends POST request to backend accepting one of the user's incoming friend requests.

        private void denyFriendReq()

        Displays all others that the user has sent a friend request to.
        Parameters:
        SentFriendReq - List of others the user has sent a friend request to.

      • cancelFriendReq

        private void cancelFriendReq()

        Displays all others the user is currently friends with.
        Parameters:
        FriendsList - List of others the user is friends with.
